questions.question: Did the ego vehicle shift from one lane to another while driving straight ahead in the video, without making a turn or entering/exiting a road?
Does the ego vehicle show signs of acceleration or deceleration during the start of the video, based on the change in surrounding object motion or visual cues?
Based on the visual evidence in the dashcam video, what is the most accurate description of the ego vehicle's overall behavior?
Is there a pedestrian walking directly in the path of the ego vehicle?
What is the weather condition in the video?
What is the time of day in the video?
Are there any traffic lights visible in the video?
What type of road is the ego vehicle driving on?
